scripts.watch: watch "npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css" assets/scripts/ assets/css/
scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path scss assets/scss/main.scss -o dist/public/css/ && npm run minify:css
scripts.minify:css: echo '=> minify:css' && cleancss dist/public/css/main.css -o dist/public/css/main.min.css && rm dist/public/css/main.css
scripts.build: echo '=> building' && npm run test -s && npm run minify:js -s && npm run build-css && npm run server
